profile.name: Khalil Samara
profile.job: Load & Performance Engineer | Flutter Enthusiast | Web Developer
profile.aboutMe: I'm a Software Engineer driven by curiosity and a love for building elegant, efficient, and impactful digital solutions. Whether I'm crafting intuitive mobile apps with Flutter or optimizing web performance, I thrive at the intersection of creativity and logic. My work spans fintech, service-based, and logistics-driven apps—each designed with a focus on user experience and scalability. I'm constantly learning, collaborating, and pushing boundaries to deliver tech that truly makes a difference.

experience.description:
- Conducted performance analysis of client software applications, evaluating key parameters identifing areas of improvement.
- Tested software performance for various clients under different loads and enviroments.
- Reported findings to clients though detailed documents and charts.
- Used JMeter and K6 for correlating, recording, and testing given different scenarios.
- Used Fiddler to record web sessions.
- Documented findings in detailed reports.

- Developed and maintained mobile apps with Flutter for both Android and iOS platforms.
- Collaborated with backend developers and designers to build scalable front-end mobile applications.
- Created three websites using wordpress and integrating clients' required content, brand identity, and additioal design requirements.
- Learned version control and implemented it using Git, Github, and Microsoft Azure.
- Independently developed and implemented a food ordering app fully adhering to client's design and requirements.
- Collaborated with several team members using Jira to organize and update tasks.

- Achieved the 2nd place in the Orange Summer Challenge.
- Worked with a team consisting of 8 members to deliver a functional four-legged robot that aids in rescue missions.
- Followed guidance from Orange team mentors to ensure project success
- Developed 2 websites; an admin dashboard and a landing page
- Connected APIs to facilitate live video feed, user authentication, and real-time notifications.

- Managed a four-person team to assemble a fully working website during a month-long project.
- Built full-stack websites using ERP Next and Frappe framework.
- Used Python and JavaScript for the back end.
- Programmed and tested APIs using Postman.
- Created print formats using HTML, and CSS

certificate.course: Application Security for Developers and DevOps Professionals

project.name: Foodtek - Easy Restaurant Ordering
project.description:
Foodtek aims to create an integrated software solution tailored to enhance the operations of a single restaurant.

User-friendly interface for clients to browse the menu, place orders, and track delivery.

Key features of the app include user authentication, maps integration, and a real-time notifications system for order updates.

Aimed at medium-sized restaurants lack the necessary tools to effectively manage their services.

Prevents inefficiencies in order processing while enhancing delivery operations, and customer engagement

project.name: Proserve - Service allocation for providers
project.description:
Proserve is a mobile application designed to streamline service allocation for providers.

The app allows users to view available services, book appointments, and manage their profiles.

Key features of the app include a user-friendly interface, secure payment processing, and real-time notifications for appointment updates.

I developed the app using Flutter for a smooth cross-platform experience, with Firebase as the backend to manage real-time data efficiently.

project.name: Carzpay - Repair Now Pay Later
project.description:
Carzpay is a mobile application designed to facilitate car repairs and maintenance services.

The app allows users to book appointments with service providers, view their profiles, and make payments for services rendered.

Key features of the app include a user-friendly interface, secure payment processing, and real-time notifications for appointment updates.

I developed the app using Flutter for a smooth cross-platform experience, with Firebase as the backend to manage real-time data efficiently.

project.name: Carzpay Repair Shops
project.description:
Carzpay Repair Shops is a mobile application aimed to be used by repair shops using the Carzpay framework.

Its main functionality is initiating repairs and enter the final amount.

Implemened a QR code scanning functionality to ensure covinience.

All changes are reflected on the Carzpay main application.

project.name: SwiftSpot - Parking spot rental system
project.description:
SwiftSpot is a mobile application designed to optimize parking availability in high-traffic areas.

The app allows users to rent out their private parking spaces when they're not in use, providing a temporary solution for those struggling to find parking near busy areas like government buildings or malls.

Key features of the app include a real-time location display of available spots and turn-by-turn directions using Google’s Open Street Library.

I developed the app using Flutter for a smooth cross-platform experience, with Firebase as the backend to manage real-time data efficiently.
